images.title: Brian Robert Marshall / Trackbed of former Somerset and Dorset railway, Midford
images.caption: Trackbed of former Somerset and Dorset railway, Midford. This is a view north. In the sunlight is the viaduct that carried the railway over the road and river. It is now part of the Sustrans National Cycle Network.

description: Follow the Somerset Coal Canal from Tucking Mill to Combe Hay on this easy walk in the Cotswolds. Tucking Mill is just west of the village of Monkton Combe so you could just as easily start off from there. You then follow the Limestone Link for about 2.5 miles to the village of Combe Hay in the Cotswolds AONB. The canal links with the Kennet and Avon Canal around Monkton Combe so you can easily extend your walk by following the towpath into Bath.
display_address: Tucking Mill Lane, Midford, Southstoke, Bath and North East Somerset, West of England, England, BA2 7DB, United Kingdom
